TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Bala_Sayiun, title = Bala_Sayiun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bala_Sayiun} }

S.FORM: == Bayah Huisin (Bala Sayiun) == ngangan ci Bayah Huisin ku ngangan u ngangan nu Hulam 飛亞飛丞 u etul u tatama u nalecuhan 2003.10.6 u minalu(niyazu') Ciwidiyan, Kalingku a kuwan u kawaw u micudaday, micudad i KuoFeng Kuochong, kapah ku bunu'. u selal nu Sakul niyazu' alamay, talabu tu selal i 2016 u kawlah maala ku kencio kawlah i 2016 a mihca. maala ku 模範生 i 2017 a mihca. u tineng niza matineng ci Bakah u 嗩吶 u piano u kita atu 優克麗麗, namaala ku takalaway a kawlah nu 國樂. mabiyas kaku aiza demiad. ci kapahay iso. balah kizemu. balah kuyuma. balah maudan. namakay cuwa a cudad 飛亞飛丞在yahoo搜尋結果

== Bayah Hoisin (Bala Sayion) == ngangan ci Bayah Hoisin ko ngangan o ngangan no Holam 飛亞飛丞 o etol o tatama o nalecohan 2003.10.6 o minalo(niyazo') Ciwidiyan, Kalingko a kowan o kawaw o micodaday, micodad i KooFeng Koochong, kapah ko bono'. o selal no Sakol niyazo' alamay, talabo to selal i 2016 o kawlah maala ko kencio kawlah i 2016 a mihca. maala ko 模範生 i 2017 a mihca. o tineng niza matineng ci Bakah o 嗩吶 o piano o kita ato 優克麗麗, namaala ko takalaway a kawlah no 國樂. mabiyas kako aiza demiad. ci kapahay iso. balah kizemo. balah koyoma. balah maodan. namakay cowa a codad 飛亞飛丞在yahoo搜尋結果
